nodes.text: Igro was a Human male criminal who was imprisoned in Belsavis prison until freed by the reconstituted Sith Empire during the invasion of Belsavis in the Galactic War. Recruited by the Empire, Igro was among a group of criminals sent to secure the Carbonite Prisoner Storage in the Minimum Security Section, but the Crisis Response Unit wiped out the group with only Igro escaping. He fled back to the Imperial Lodgement and reported the failure to the Sith Lord Medechas.
Igro appears in a cutscene in the Imperial mission "The Carbon Gallery" on Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
